author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Prismagic Screwdrivers launch on December 26th, sign up here! https://lmg.gg/signupprismagic

Click this link https://boot.dev/?promo=LTT and use my code LTT to get 25% off your first payment for boot.dev.

After three long years on a temporary set surrounded by noisy neighbors, we’re giving our ShortCircuit channel a long-overdue glow-up. Come check out their new, state-of-the-art home, complete with new sets, new lights, and new gadgets. But don’t worry, you still get the same lovable Bell running the show!

Big Thanks to Aputure for supplying the new lighting package! Check them out here: https://bit.ly/4s1Uu0Y

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1629052-unboxing-our-new-set/

Check out our Channel Partners:
Secretlab - Get up to $249 off during their Black Friday/Cyber Monday sale (ends Dec. 5 2025): https://lmg.gg/secretlabltt
PIA - Get the VPN of our choice: https://www.piavpn.com/ltt
dbrand - Buy a "Circuit" series skin for your device: https://dbrand.com/pcb
title: We Should Have Done This YEARS Ago
